transcript.text:
￼


























Designer Studio
PDF Block Template

2 min
add interactive fields into your pdf documents, such that the end user can edit the form to add specialized form fields, such as a drop down list, list box, or buttons at onprintshop, we will help you create pdf block templates rules and help your users edit them more correctly follow the below steps to create and add a pdf block template into the designer studio step 1 download the plug in following the instructions mentioned in this manual step 2 create the pdf block template following the instructions explained in this video also, with the use of the pdflib plugin, you get the exact position of existing text fields of pdf block templates learn how to create pdf block templates using pdflib tet plugin step 3 finally, upload the pdf block templates into admin panel after successfully uploading the files, you can create rules for the pdf block templates
Did this page help you?
